name: Genesect ex
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Metallic Signal
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Evolution {M} Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Protect Charge
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
